about.description: Front-End developer with expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, currently studying Computer Science at PUC-PR. With 2 years of intensive study, I master Tailwind CSS, REST APIs, Git, and Docker, along with knowledge of MySQL and MongoDB. My experience as a Graphic Designer has added UI/UX insight to projects. I am organized, proactive, and have intermediate English (B1), always striving to improve technically.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Some projects I developed to practice and showcase my skills

projectDescriptions.weatherApp: Weather forecast app with light/dark theme support. Forecast by city or current location, with clean, responsive UI and internationalization.
projectDescriptions.reactFirebaseAuth: Academic project with Firebase authentication and database. Registration, login, and data visualization with Tailwind CSS interface.
projectDescriptions.reactDevOps: React app with mocked API, automated tests (Jest), and automated deployment via GitHub Actions. Focus on DevOps and CI/CD.
projectDescriptions.imcCalculator: IMC calculator with React, supporting metric and imperial systems. Personalized messages, animations with Framer Motion.
